name: Legacy Raiders
description:
"...That day, the foundation crumbled. In her last wish to remain eternal, she unleashed a new era in the Dreamscape: the phenomena known as 'Legacy' began to appear, a continuous reminder of her lingering presence."

Legacy Raiders is a kinetic visual novel which follows the adventures of two travelers who wander the realm of dreams in search of the magical items known as Legacies. One is Lua, a power hungry but kindhearted shaman, with experience in all sorts of dangerous situations. The other is a common girl lacking in magic, who is followed by a mysterious companion. Working under the great sage Melissa Lostrius, they must recover Legacies from all sorts of different worlds while evading their pursuers from the ruthless Ferrosa Family.

This is an ongoing project that tells the first arc of a much greater story. With a single payment, you get access to every new chapter until the arc wraps up. The goal is to release a new chapter every month from here on out, and hopefully with your support, I can make it happen! Any feedback is appreciated, and I'll do my best to continue making and improving this story for everyone to enjoy!

Our cycle is now. Let's make it good.~

!! Contains multiple instances of strong language.
